content: I like bitcoin i got in to it a few years back mining investing a little of both and other coin tooBitcoinTalk ReviewFor : 100 Bitcoin (Satoshi)Description :Take sometime to write a review/comment on bitcointalk.org on our official thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=212.0. We appreciate any positive comment, post payment proof or mention of specific features of our website.After You Are Done :Please Make sure to only comment on our official thread, any other comments will not be eligible for the reward Post a screenshot of the review with the link visibleStatus : Not Attempted
